Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by Longport in 1969...
Injured on 4/26/1970 with a Pulled Tricep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 6/22/1973, off John Dorsett (TRO)...
Earned first career win on 4/15/1974...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Pitcher in 1977...
Injured on 9/28/1978 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 2/8/1979 to a 3-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Pitcher in 1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1980, winning 2 games with a 0.54 ERA...
Hit first career homerun on 6/30/1981, off Juan Ortega (Min)...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 3/1/1984 to a minor league contract.
